name: haxegon
description: A tiny Haxe programming library for beginners. Powered by OpenFL and Starling.
releasenote: Work in progress, getting more and more stable! 0.12.0 focuses on structure and plugin support. See http://www.haxegon.com for documentation and examples, or track the project's development on github: https://github.com/haxegon/haxegon.
